resources.string: Enables Screen Translate to detect scrolling in other apps for seamless translation. This service helps identify when content changes so translations can be updated accurately.
Screen Translate needs Accessibility Service to detect scrolling and translate content across different apps.

Benefits:
• Seamless translation while scrolling
• Works across multiple applications
• Improves translation accuracy

How to enable:
1. Tap 'Enable'
2. Find 'Screen Translate Scroll Detection' in Accessibility Services
3. Toggle the service on
